Feb. 5, 1977 D North West Brass Band Association Youth Contest
North West Brass Band Association Youth Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
north-west-brass-band-association-youth-contest
None
Imperial Hotel, Blackpool, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £200 and trophy, 2nd £100, 3rd £75, 4th silver plated posthorn. 11 bands competed. 2nd annual contest.
May 29, 2012, 10:41 p.m. March 23, 2017, 4:26 p.m.
